projects.name: Photo Exhibiter
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Bootstrap 4
projects.description: A social network for photographers. Features include:  browse, post, edit, cancel(soft delete), and search exhibits, attend/unattend exhibits, and notifications. Architecture: CQRS/DDD inspired.

projects.name: Rollei Shop
projects.technologies: ASP.NET Core 2.0, EF Core 2.0, Identity Framework, Semantic UI
projects.description: An ecommerce shop. Features include: Browse catalog, manage shopping cart, checkout order, browse order history. Architecture: CQRS/DDD inspired.

projects.name: Dapper University
projects.description: The wonderful Contoso University sample project, written in dapper.

projects.name: Growler
projects.technologies: MONO/Suave(F#), SQL Type Providers, UI Kit
projects.description: A social network similar to twitter. Features include: browse and send growls, follow users.
